reviewText: I got all the way through only because I had something to keep me preoccupied. Rex Harrison is typecast, again. It's more sober than fun,
Rex Harrison, Rita Hayworth and in a heist comedy shot on location in Spain. Great fun.
Nice musical score.  The plot plods along.  It is not one of Rita Hawyworth's better pictures.  Slow and plodding.

This is a very enjoyable old movie. It will most likely give you a new perspective on possible life choices.
A week plot which wasted some great talents.  No real story line and some terribly poor acting by several of the cast members.  One star is the least I could assign.
Just love old movies. Fun to watch, and really enjoy such outstanding actting. Plan to watch more in the future

The plot of this movie sounds like it could be really entertaining, but it just never got off the ground with me.  Nothing about it rang true.  There wasn't anything offensive, it just wasn't very interesting, really ho-hum.
